price: 他们有一种迹象：已死的大地，我使它复活，我使它生长粮食，以作他们的食品。
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ ٱلۡمَيۡتَةُ أَحۡيَيۡنَٰهَا وَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مِنۡهَا حَبّٗا فَمِنۡهُ يَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahumu al-arḍu al-maytatu aḥyaynāhā wa-akhrajnā min'hā ḥabban famin'hu yakulūna
